item.title: Search Google Photos by Device
item.description: Requirement I'm trying to search photos in Google Photos by device name, but it's strange... I have a Google Pixel 5, if I use Google Pixel 5, I can get all photos, but if I only use Google Pixel, it only shows partial photos. I don't know the actual rules, the following is my test results. Apple iPhone 6 Apple iPhone 11 Apple iPhone XS Max Apple iPad (6th generation) Google Pixel 5 samsung SM-M135F (Samsumg Galaxy M13) samsung SM-G935F (Samsung S7 edge) Panasonic DMC-G6 Panasonic DMC-G2 SONY DSC-RX100M5A And you can use Apple, Google, Samsung to find their devices, but it will search some othes photos.
